doc.name: rotationRateChanged
doc.summary: Sent to the current card of the default stack when the rotation of the device changes.

p.i: -- display the rotation rate along the x axis

description.overview: Handle the rotationRateChanged message if you want to perform an action when the rate of acceleration along any axis changes.

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: the rate of acceleration around the x axis, in radians/second

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: the rate of acceleration around the y axis, in radians/second

parameter.name: z
parameter.description: the rate of acceleration around the x axis, in radians/second

description.comments: The rotationRateChanged message is sent to the current card of the default stack when the rate of rotation of the device changes.
